desc: Located in the Booz garage, P2 level, and the Allen garage, L1 level

Located at: 8285 Greensboro Drive, McLean, VA 22102 - These charging stations are available for employee use, first come first served, in the Booz Building. The two charging stations are located on the P2 Level of the parking garage. If you have questions, contact Workplace.bah.com.
Located in the Hamilton Lower Level. Showers available. To use the Center, staff must sign a release form, available from Access Control Office, Booz 1009. Hours of Operation: 24 hours with badge
JavaWorks is in the Booz Building.
The Greensboro Cafe is in the Allen Building
Located in Hamilton H-6005, H-8015, and B-3072. The access code can be obtained from Facilities Operations.

are available for client use in the Hamilton Building as follows: Hamilton 2nd floor room H2018. Reservations for these offices can be made through Reserve.bah.com. See the Concierge on the 5th floor for information.
